content.question: In which of the following situations would the Supreme Court be most likely to utilize the doctrine of selective incorporation?

choices.label: When an individual claims that a right protected by the Bill of Rights is infringed upon by a state
When there is a conflict among the branches of the national government
When a federal policy shifting oversight authority from a national agency to a state agency is challenged
When a former employee files a wrongful termination claim against a company headquartered in another state

content.answer: When an individual claims that a right protected by the Bill of Rights is infringed upon by a state
